body:
Yeah make them all smart.

On Fri, Jun 10, 2016, 9:50 PM Sergei Vorobev notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Steps to reproduce
> - Open new terminal on Linux
> - run powershell
> - import-module ./build.psm1 -Force
> - Start-PSxUnit -Verbose
> 
> Note: same could be applicable to other functions from build.psm1
> Expected behavior
> 
> test run
> Actual behavior
> 
> error that dotnet is unknown command
> Environment data
> 
> v0.4.0
> 
> > $PSVersionTable
> 
> $ dotnet --info
> 
> That's the thing. dotnet is not there by default :)$ git rev-parse HEAD; git status58425bbcc0c7f5845d0b9230b1dceb7d24cceb03
>
